column1: Title  : M651281 - Road Traffic Accident Casualties, Annual
Motor Vehicle Drivers & Passengers Cars & Station Wagons
Motor Vehicle Drivers & Passengers Cars & Station Wagons
CARS - INCLUDES PRIVATE AND COMPANY CARS.
PUBLIC MOTOR CARS - INCLUDES TAXIS AND PRIVATE HIRE CARS.
GOODS & OTHER VEHICLES - INCLUDES 'GOODS VEHICLES' (FROM JAN 1962 TO DEC 1994), 'OTHERS' (FROM JAN 1974 TO DEC 1994) AND 'ROAD ROLLERS & TRACTORS' (FROM JAN 1962 TO DEC 1988).
